verses.text: Now these \add are\add* the commandments , the statutes , and the judgments , which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your God commanded to teach you, that ye might do \add them\add* in the land whither ye go to possess it:\f + \fr 6.1 \ft go: Heb. pass over\f*

That thou mightest fear the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God , to keep all his statutes and his commandments , which I command thee, thou, and thy son , and thy son’s son , all the days of thy life ; and that thy days may be prolonged. \p

¶ Hear therefore, O Israel , and observe to do \add it;\add* that it may be well with thee, and that ye may increase mightily , as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* God of thy fathers hath promised thee, in the land that floweth with milk and honey. \p

Hear , O Israel : The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our God \add is\add* one 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*:
And thou shalt love the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God with all thine heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy might.
And these words , which I command thee this day , shall be in thine heart :

And thou shalt teach them diligently unto thy children , and shalt talk of them when thou sittest in thine house , and when thou walkest by the way , and when thou liest down , and when thou risest up.\f + \fr 6.7 \ft teach: Heb. whet, or, sharpen\f*
And thou shalt bind them for a sign upon thine hand , and they shall be as frontlets between thine eyes.
And thou shalt write them upon the posts of thy house , and on thy gates.

And it shall be, when the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God shall have brought thee into the land which he sware unto thy fathers , to Abraham , to Isaac , and to Jacob , to give thee great and goodly cities , which thou buildedst not,

And houses full of all good \add things\add*, which thou filledst not, and wells digged , which thou diggedst not, vineyards and olive trees , which thou plantedst not; when thou shalt have eaten and be full ;

\add Then\add* beware lest thou forget the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which brought thee forth out of the land of Egypt , from the house of bondage.\f + \fr 6.12 \ft bondage: Heb. bondmen or, servants\f*
Thou shalt fear the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God , and serve him, and shalt swear by his name.
Ye shall not go after other gods , of the gods of the people which \add are\add* round about you;

(For the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God \add is\add* a jealous God among you) lest the anger of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God be kindled against thee, and destroy thee from off the face of the earth. \p
¶ Ye shall not tempt the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your God , as ye tempted \add him\add* in Massah. \p
Ye shall diligently keep the commandments of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your God , and his testimonies , and his statutes , which he hath commanded thee.

And thou shalt do \add that which is\add* right and good in the sight of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: that it may be well with thee, and that thou mayest go in and possess the good land which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* sware unto thy fathers ,
To cast out all thine enemies from before thee, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath spoken.

\add And\add* when thy son asketh thee in time to come , saying , What \add mean\add* the testimonies , and the statutes , and the judgments , which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our God hath commanded you?\f + \fr 6.20 \ft in…: Heb. to morrow\f*
Then thou shalt say unto thy son , We were Pharaoh’s bondmen in Egypt ; and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* brought us out of Egypt with a mighty hand :
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shewed signs and wonders , great and sore , upon Egypt , upon Pharaoh , and upon all his household , before our eyes :\f + \fr 6.22 \ft sore: Heb. evil\f*
And he brought us out from thence, that he might bring us in , to give us the land which he sware unto our fathers.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* commanded us to do all these statutes , to fear the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our God , for our good always , that he might preserve us alive , as \add it is\add* at this day.
And it shall be our righteousness , if we observe to do all these commandments before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our God , as he hath commanded us.
